testcase.name: DBA.TM32
testcase.description: DBA.TM32: ReportingPeriodStartDate with the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:RegisteredReportingPeriodDeviatingFromReportedReportingPeriodDueArbitraryDatesMember must only be tagged once.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: ReportingPeriodStartDate with the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:RegisteredReportingPeriodDeviatingFromReportedReportingPeriodDueArbitraryDatesMember appears twice
